recipes.name: Espresso
recipes.description: A concentrated shot of coffee with a rich crema
instructions: Grind coffee beans to a fine consistency
Tamp the grounds evenly in the portafilter
Serve immediately in a warm cup

recipes.name: Doppio
recipes.description: A double shot of espresso

recipes.name: Ristretto
recipes.description: A short, restricted shot of espresso - sweeter and more concentrated
instructions: Result is thicker and less bitter than espresso

recipes.name: Lungo
recipes.description: A 'long' espresso shot with more water extracted
instructions: Flavor is milder but more bitter

recipes.name: Americano
recipes.description: Espresso diluted with hot water for a milder flavor
instructions: Pull a double shot of espresso
Add hot water to desired strength
For iced version, add cold water and ice

recipes.name: Long Black
recipes.description: Hot water with espresso poured on top to preserve crema
instructions: Pull double shot of espresso directly onto the water
Serve immediately to keep crema intact

recipes.name: Cappuccino
recipes.description: Equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam
instructions: Pull a double shot of espresso
Top with a thick layer of foam

recipes.name: Caffè Latte
recipes.description: Espresso with steamed milk and a light foam layer
instructions: Pull a double shot of espresso
Pour steamed milk gently over espresso
For iced: pour over ice instead

recipes.name: Flat White
recipes.description: Double espresso with velvety steamed milk, less foam than latte
instructions: Pull a double shot of espresso
Steam milk to create silky microfoam
Pour milk in a steady stream
Result should be velvety smooth throughout

recipes.name: Galão
recipes.description: Portuguese drink with espresso and plenty of foamed milk
instructions: Brew espresso into a tall glass
Fill the rest of the glass with hot foamed milk
Similar to a latte but with lighter coffee ratio

recipes.name: Caffè Mocha
recipes.description: Espresso with chocolate and steamed milk
instructions: Pull a double shot of espresso over chocolate
Top with whipped cream if desired

recipes.name: Marocchino
recipes.description: Layers of cocoa powder, espresso, and milk foam
instructions: Dust the bottom of a small glass cup with cocoa powder
Pull a shot of espresso over the cocoa
Dust the espresso with more cocoa powder
Top with milk froth until the cup is full
Finish with a final dusting of cocoa

recipes.name: Bicerin
recipes.description: Traditional Turin drink with espresso, chocolate, and milk
instructions: Pour hot chocolate into the bottom of a glass
Carefully layer espresso over the chocolate
Top with a layer of whole milk or lightly whipped cream

recipes.name: Café Bombón
recipes.description: Espresso served over sweetened condensed milk
instructions: Pour condensed milk into a small glass
Slowly pour espresso on top to create a layer

recipes.name: Espresso Macchiato
recipes.description: Espresso 'stained' with a dollop of milk foam
instructions: Pull a double shot of espresso
Steam a small amount of milk
Add a dollop of foam to mark the espresso

recipes.name: Espresso Con Panna
recipes.description: Espresso topped with whipped cream
instructions: Pull a double shot of espresso
Top with a generous dollop of whipped cream

recipes.name: Cortado
recipes.description: Equal parts espresso and warm milk to reduce acidity
instructions: Pull a double shot of espresso
Pour equal amount of milk into espresso

recipes.name: Red Eye
recipes.description: Drip coffee with a shot of espresso
instructions: Brew a cup of drip coffee

recipes.name: Black Eye
recipes.description: Drip coffee with two shots of espresso
instructions: Brew a cup of drip coffee

recipes.name: Dead Eye
recipes.description: Drip coffee with three shots of espresso - very high caffeine
instructions: Brew a cup of drip coffee

recipes.name: Turkish Coffee
recipes.description: Unfiltered coffee brewed in an ibrik with sugar
instructions: Combine cold water, sugar, and coffee in ibrik
Heat on medium-low until foam rises
Remove from heat, scoop foam into cup
Return to heat until foam rises again

recipes.name: Drip Coffee
recipes.description: Standard automatic filter coffee

recipes.name: Bulletproof Coffee
recipes.description: Coffee blended with butter and MCT oil
instructions: Add coffee, butter, and oil to blender

recipes.name: Cold Brew
recipes.description: Coffee steeped in cold water for a smooth, less acidic taste
instructions: Combine coffee and cold water in container
Strain through fine mesh or filter
Dilute concentrate 1:1 with water or milk

recipes.name: Iced Latte
recipes.description: Chilled espresso with cold milk over ice
instructions: Pull a double shot of espresso

recipes.name: Iced Cappuccino
recipes.description: Chilled espresso with cold frothed milk
instructions: Pull a double shot of espresso
Froth cold milk using a frother

recipes.name: Mazagran
recipes.description: Iced coffee with lemon, often called the 'original iced coffee'
instructions: Brew strong coffee and let cool
Mix coffee with lemon juice and sugar

recipes.name: Yuanyang
recipes.description: Popular Hong Kong drink mixing coffee and milk tea
instructions: Brew strong black tea and mix with condensed milk
Mix coffee and milk tea together (ratio can vary)

recipes.name: Frappé
recipes.description: Blended iced coffee with a frothy texture
instructions: Add coffee, milk, ice, and sugar to blender
Top with whipped cream if desired

recipes.name: Pour Over
recipes.description: Manual brewing method for a clean, nuanced cup
instructions: Place filter in dripper and rinse with hot water
Pour remaining water in slow circles
Total brew time should be 3-4 minutes

recipes.name: French Press
recipes.description: Full-bodied immersion brew with natural oils
instructions: Add coarsely ground coffee to press
Pour hot water and stir briefly
Place lid on and steep for 4 minutes

recipes.name: Affogato
recipes.description: Espresso poured over vanilla gelato or ice cream
instructions: Place scoops of vanilla gelato in cup
Pour hot espresso directly over gelato

recipes.name: Vietnamese Coffee
recipes.description: Strong drip coffee with sweetened condensed milk
instructions: Add condensed milk to bottom of glass
Place phin filter on top of glass
Pour small amount of water to bloom
Wait for coffee to drip through
Stir and serve hot or over ice

recipes.name: Nitro Cold Brew
recipes.description: Cold brew infused with nitrogen for a creamy, stout-like texture
instructions: Charge with nitrogen using a nitro system
Do not add ice - served cold from tap

recipes.name: Irish Coffee
recipes.description: Hot coffee with Irish whiskey and cream
instructions: Warm your glass with hot water
Pour in hot coffee and stir
Float lightly whipped cream on top
Do not stir - drink through cream

recipes.name: Espresso Martini
recipes.description: A cold, caffeinated alcoholic cocktail made with espresso, coffee liqueur, and vodka
instructions: Brew espresso and let it cool slightly
Add espresso, vodka, coffee liqueur, and syrup to shaker with ice
Strain into a chilled martini glass

recipes.name: White Russian Coffee
recipes.description: A hot twist on the classic cocktail with coffee, vodka, and cream
instructions: Add vodka and coffee liqueur to mug
Top with heavy cream or whipped cream

recipes.name: Carajillo
recipes.description: Spanish drink combining coffee with brandy, whisky, or anisette
instructions: Pour liquor into glass (can be served over ice)

recipes.name: Caffè Corretto
recipes.description: Italian espresso 'corrected' with a small amount of liquor
instructions: Add liquor directly to the cup or serve on side

recipes.name: Spanish Coffee
recipes.description: Flaming rum-based coffee cocktail
instructions: Rim glass with sugar and lemon
Add rum and light it on fire to caramelize sugar
Add coffee liqueur and hot coffee
Top with whipped cream and nutmeg

recipes.name: Café de Olla
recipes.description: Traditional Mexican coffee brewed with cinnamon and piloncillo
instructions: Boil water with cinnamon and piloncillo
Add coffee grounds and remove from heat

recipes.name: South Indian Filter Coffee
recipes.description: Strong decoction coffee mixed with hot frothy milk and sugar
instructions: Add coffee powder to upper cup of filter
Wait for decoction to drip (15 mins)
Mix decoction with hot milk and sugar
Pour back and forth between cup and saucer to froth

recipes.name: Eiskaffee
recipes.description: German iced coffee with vanilla ice cream and whipped cream
instructions: Place ice cream in tall glass
Pour chilled coffee over ice cream
Top with whipped cream and chocolate shavings

recipes.name: Cà Phê Trứng (Egg Coffee)
recipes.description: Vietnamese coffee topped with airy egg yolk foam
instructions: Whip egg yolk and condensed milk until frothy and pale
Pour egg foam gently over hot coffee

recipes.name: Einspänner
recipes.description: Viennese classic: double espresso topped with lots of whipped cream

recipes.name: Wiener Melange
recipes.description: Mild coffee with milk, similar to cappuccino but lighter
instructions: Brew espresso in a large cup
Ratio is typically 1:1 coffee to milk

recipes.name: Café au Lait
recipes.description: French breakfast coffee with hot milk
instructions: Pour coffee and milk simultaneously into cup/bowl

recipes.name: Café con Leche
recipes.description: Spanish coffee with scalded milk

recipes.name: Caffè Breve
recipes.description: American variation of a latte using steamed half-and-half

recipes.name: Dirty Chai Latte
recipes.description: Spiced chai tea latte with a shot of espresso
instructions: Prepare chai tea or use concentrate

recipes.name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
recipes.description: Seasonal favorite with pumpkin spice flavors
instructions: Mix syrup and espresso in cup
Top with whipped cream and pumpkin pie spice

recipes.name: Espresso Tonic
recipes.description: Refreshing iced drink with tonic water and espresso

recipes.name: Caffè Shakerato
recipes.description: Italian iced coffee shaken with sugar
instructions: Combine espresso, sweetener, and ice in shaker

recipes.name: Japanese Iced Coffee
recipes.description: Flash-brewed coffee dripped directly onto ice

recipes.name: Bumble Coffee
recipes.description: Layers of orange juice and espresso over ice
instructions: Slowly pour espresso on top to layer

recipes.name: Dirty Matcha Latte
recipes.description: Green tea latte with a shot of espresso
instructions: Whisk matcha with small amount of water

recipes.name: Caffè Borgia
recipes.description: Mocha with orange zest and whipped cream
instructions: Mix equal parts coffee and hot chocolate
Stir in orange zest or syrup
Top with whipped cream and more zest

recipes.name: Honey Lavender Latte
recipes.description: Floral and sweet latte
instructions: Brew espresso over honey and lavender syrup

recipes.name: Salted Caramel Latte
recipes.description: Sweet and salty flavored latte
instructions: Mix caramel sauce and salt with espresso
Top with foam or whipped cream and caramel drizzle

recipes.name: Cardamom Coffee
recipes.description: Coffee brewed with cardamom pods, common in Middle East
instructions: Add water, sugar, and cardamom to pot

recipes.name: Arabic Coffee (Qahwa)
recipes.description: Light roast coffee with cardamom and saffron
instructions: Boil water, add coffee, simmer 10 mins

recipes.name: Pharisäer
recipes.description: German coffee with rum and whipped cream
instructions: Top with whipped cream (do not stir)

recipes.name: Rüdesheimer Kaffee
recipes.description: German coffee with Asbach Uralt brandy
instructions: Place sugar and brandy in cup, flame it
Top with vanilla whipped cream and chocolate flakes

recipes.name: Café Brulot
recipes.description: New Orleans spiced flaming coffee cocktail
instructions: Heat spices, peel, sugar, and brandy
Pour hot coffee into the flaming mixture

recipes.name: Gunfire
recipes.description: British Army cocktail of black tea or coffee with rum

recipes.name: Kaffekask
recipes.description: Swedish coffee with vodka or aquavit
instructions: Add coffee until coin is hidden
Add clear liquor until coin is visible again (traditional folklore method)

recipes.name: Barraquito
recipes.description: Canary Islands multi-layered coffee liqueur drink
instructions: Garnish with cinnamon and lemon peel

recipes.name: Asiático
recipes.description: Coffee from Cartagena, Spain with condensed milk and brandy
instructions: Add few coffee beans, lemon rind, cinnamon

recipes.name: Café Savoy
recipes.description: Slovakian coffee with egg yolk, sugar, and rum/brandy

recipes.name: Normandy Coffee
recipes.description: Coffee with Calvados (apple brandy)
instructions: Add Calvados and sugar to mug

recipes.name: Amaretto Coffee
recipes.description: Coffee with almond-flavored Amaretto liqueur

recipes.name: Maple Pecan Latte
recipes.description: Nutty and sweet latte with maple syrup

recipes.name: Cortadito
recipes.description: Cuban espresso cut with steamed milk
instructions: Brew strong Cuban espresso with sugar

recipes.name: Café Cubano
recipes.description: Strong espresso whipped with sugar to create 'espumita'
instructions: Brew first few drops of espresso
Whip vigorously with sugar to create thick foam

recipes.name: Café Zorro
recipes.description: A double shot of espresso diluted 1:1 with hot water
instructions: Add equal amount of hot water

recipes.name: White Chocolate Mocha
recipes.description: Sweet and creamy espresso drink with white chocolate sauce
instructions: Add white chocolate sauce to cup
Pull double shot of espresso over sauce

recipes.name: Mexican Spiced Mocha
recipes.description: Rich chocolate coffee spiced with cinnamon and a hint of chili
instructions: Mix chocolate and spices with espresso
Top with whipped cream and dusting of cinnamon

recipes.name: Black Forest Mocha
recipes.description: Decadent mix of chocolate, cherry, and coffee flavors
instructions: Combine chocolate sauce and cherry syrup
Top with steamed milk and whipped cream
Garnish with chocolate shavings or a cherry

recipes.name: Peppermint Mocha
recipes.description: Festive blend of cool peppermint and rich chocolate
instructions: Mix mocha sauce and peppermint syrup in cup
Top with whipped cream and crushed candy cane

recipes.name: Nutella Latte
recipes.description: Hazelnut and chocolate spread melted into a creamy latte
instructions: Put Nutella in bottom of cup
Pull hot espresso directly onto spread

cupTypes.name: Fincan (Turkish)
cupTypes.description: Tiny porcelain cup for Turkish coffee

grindSizes.name: Extra Fine
grindSizes.description: Powdery, like flour - for Turkish coffee

grindSizes.name: Medium-Fine
grindSizes.description: Finer than sand - for pour over

grindSizes.name: Coarse
grindSizes.description: Like sea salt - for French press
